column3: ACK. Pulled into trivial-next, so you can close this. In the short-term future for pulls like this, please PR them directly to the trivial-next branch in https://github.com/theuni/bitcoin . These will be merged into mainline bitcoin every few weeks.\n\nThis has been setup to reduce the PR load on the main bitcoin repo. If this goes well, a bitcoin-trivial tree will likely be setup under the bitcoi
